nodes.text: In 28 ABY, a Jedi team commenced a hunt for the sentient hyperspace-capable planet of Zonama Sekot, at the time of the Yuuzhan Vong War. Soon joined by the Imperial Remnant frigate Widowmaker, the team managed to find Zonama Sekot in the Unknown Regions's Klasse Ephemora system after discovering the location of planet through the use of Csilla's Expeditionary Library.
